info.name: Fleet Admin Dashboard API
info.description: Comprehensive collection for Fleet Admin Dashboard (fleet + users). Includes endpoints, query params, and sample request bodies.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Battery Low",
  "description": "Notify when battery below 20%",
  "severity": "high",
  "system": "battery",
  "is_active": true,
  "condition_logic": "AND",
  "trigger_duration_sec": 60,
  "cooldown_minutes": 15,
  "auto_resolve": true,
  "notification_channels": ["email"],
  "recipients": ["ops@example.com"],
  "vehicle_types": [1],
  "conditions": [
    {"field": "battery_level_percent", "operator": "<", "threshold": 20}
  ]
}

{
  "vehicle": 34,
  "maintenance_type": "routine",
  "title": "Annual service",
  "description": "Change oil, rotate tires",
  "scheduled_date": "2025-10-01T10:00:00Z",
  "priority": "High",
  "estimated_duration_hours": 2.5,
  "work_order_number": "WO-2025-0001",
  "location": "Service Bay A",
  "alerts_enabled": true
}
